examples: Poseidon Water as a company does not believe that seawater desalination is a panacea.

words.defineEn: something that is believed to cure any disease or illness
words.defineVi: một cái gì đó được cho là để chữa bệnh hoặc bệnh tật

examples: Then, we’d have only a week or so of Mad-Max-style pandemonium instead of years.
Black Friday plus two dollar waffle iron equals pandemonium.
words.defineEn: a state of extreme confusion and disorder
words.defineVi: một trạng thái cực kỳ bối rối và rối loạn

examples: His designs combine Doric columns with a sweeping Ionic frieze, hosting a vast panorama of the city’s Great Panathenaic festival.

You might have to go to different panoramas.

After landing, the next few days were spent unlocking and testing the mission’s hardware, taking a full, 360-degree panorama, and just generally getting situated.
words.defineEn: a picture (or series of pictures) representing a continuous scene
words.defineVi: một hình ảnh (hoặc một loạt hình ảnh) đại diện cho một cảnh liên tục

examples: The protests against the authoritarian regime were a manifestation of the belief that disobedience is the true foundation of liberty, as citizens stood up against oppression to demand greater freedom.

Also, like a lot of revolutions, in the end it exchanged an authoritarian regime for an authoritarian regime.

examples: Russia has always been a bureaucratic autocracy.

words.defineEn: a political theory favoring unlimited authority by a single individual
words.defineVi: một lý thuyết chính trị ủng hộ quyền hạn vô hạn của một cá nhân

examples: And he took titles autocrat and tsar, which means Caesar.

And if you're Putin, an insecure autocrat who is looking at neighboring countries that are being swept up in these populist democratic revolutions, he has to always fear that something like that could sweep through Russia itself.
He's a kind of czar, an autocrat.
He's a kind of czar, he's an autocrat.
words.defineVi: một nhà độc tài độc ác và áp bức

examples: To reduce the risk of heart disease, trim the excess fat from meat before cooking.
The athlete knew that overtraining could lead to burnout and injury, so she balanced intense workouts with rest and recovery, as she believed that honey in excess is no longer sweet.
After cooking the sausages, she poured off the excess drippings and used them to fry vegetables.
The low-calorie salad dressing used a bulking agent to create a satisfying texture without adding excess calories.
Excess baggage made up the remainder.
words.defineEn: much more than the desirable or required amount
words.defineVi: nhiều hơn số lượng mong muốn hoặc yêu cầu

examples: The real estate investment provided a high yield, exceeding the initial expectations of the investors.

The official death toll now exceeds 15,000.
In the wintertime, PM2.5 levels in Milan regularly exceed 100.
SALES at public auctions exceeded $29 billion last year.
words.defineEn: be greater in scope or size than some standard
words.defineVi: có phạm vi hoặc kích thước lớn hơn một số tiêu chuẩn

examples: Overall, a lion portion of our water is reclaimed.

words.defineEn: to get back something that has been lost, taken away, etc.
words.defineVi: để lấy lại thứ gì đó đã bị mất, bị lấy đi, v.v.

examples: You just kind of recollect on what you just went through and you're just trying to catch your breath for the most part.

words.defineEn: to bring to mind past memories or experiences
words.defineVi: để nhớ lại những kỷ niệm hoặc kinh nghiệm trong quá khứ

examples: "I know we had a disagreement earlier, but let not the sun go down on your wrath," said Sarah, trying to reconcile with her sister.

words.defineVi: đưa vào phụ âm hoặc phù hợp

examples: They discovered a new cassava dish during their travels and couldn't wait to recreate it at home.

words.defineVi: để làm một cái gì đó một lần nữa, hoặc để đưa một cái gì đó trở lại sự tồn tại

examples: maybe, but I think it has the most natural synergy with brownie.

You know, any time you bring on someone like a Mars that has just such a broad reach globally has the sort of resources that they can to try to sort of bring these synergies together with their existing portfolio in the chocolate space and try to push that forward.

examples: In lichen, fungus and algae work together in a relationship called symbiosis.
